Analysis - General.title: Channel Names
Analysis - General.desc: The names assigned to the isolated channels.Separate the individual names by ';' in the order BRGXY...Z

Analysis - General.title: Main Channel Index
Analysis - General.desc: Index of the channel containing nuclei

Analysis - General.title: Prefer Machine Learning
Analysis - General.desc: Sets the standard method for analysis to machine learning

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Quality Check
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Activates a quality check for nuclei and foci after analysis. Might increase data fidelity. Adverse effect on performance

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Quality: Minimal Nucleus Area
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Detected Nuclei with a size below this threshold will be removed

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Quality: Minimal Focus Area
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Detected foci with a size below this threshold will be removed

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Blob Detection - Minimum standard deviation
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: The minimum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Lower values will help to detect smaller foci

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Blob Detection - Maximum standard deviation
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: The maximum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Higher values will help to detect larger foci

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Blob Detection - Number of standard deviation steps
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: The number of deviation steps between the minimum and maximum standard deviation. Higher values will result in more accurate results. Adverse effect on performance

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Blob Detection - Threshold
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Threshold for foci detection. Foci with an intensity lower than the thresold will be ignored. Lower values will help to detect foci with lower intensity

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Blob Detection - Overlap
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Allowed overlap of foci in percent. Foci overlap more than this value, the smaller foci will be ignored

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Nucleus Detection - Iterations
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Number of maximum filtering to perform in a row. Change only if you know what you are doing. Adverse effect on performance

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Nucleus Detection - Mask Size
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: The diameter of the circular mask for filtering. Adverse effect on performance

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Nucleus Detection - Percentage of Histogram Maximum
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: The amount of the histogram maximum added to the histogram minimum to form the detection threshold.

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Nucleus Detection - Local Threshold Multiplier
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Multiplier used to increase mask_size for local thresholding

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Nucleus Detection - Noise Removal Size Multiplier
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Multiplier used to increase mask_size for noise removal

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Focus Detection - Lower Hysteresis Threshold for Canny Operator
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Lower bound for hysteresis thresholding in percent of dtype max

Analysis - Image Processing.title: Focus Detection - Upper Hysteresis Threshold for Canny Operator
Focus Detection - Sigma for Canny Operator
Analysis - Image Processing.desc: Standard deviation of used gaussian filter. Adverse effect on performance

Analysis - Machine Learning.title: Detection Certainty
Analysis - Machine Learning.desc: Minimum required detection certainty in percent for nucleus detection

Analysis - Machine Learning.title: Detection Certainty
Analysis - Machine Learning.desc: Minimum required detection certainty in percent for nucleus detection

Modification.title: Show Ellipses
Modification.desc: If active, the approximated ellipses for detected nuclei will be shown on all channels

Modification.title: Mouse Tracking
Modification.desc: If active, the hovered coordinates of the mouse will be shown
